QuestData.Title: Spriggan Snares
QuestData.Description:
I'm so glad you and Qadarin were passing by! These spriggans are crazy!
Get me out of here!
I was gathering some herbs from the garden when they nabbed me. I'm sure they've captured other souls, too!
QuestData.RewardText: Capturing souls is a far more brazen act than the typical spriggan prank. I wonder what has changed...
